txt.en: Challenge: Roots of Fangorn -- Green Thumb
Defeat Gurthúl without allowing any of the roots of the forest to be poisoned.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest will be cancelled if you leave Roots of Fangorn before completing it.</rgb>
The Roots of the Forest remain uncorrupted by the spider's venom!

Gurthúl has unleashed her venomous spiderlings upon the roots of the forest. You must <rgb=#FF0000>prevent any roots from being corrupted by their poison</rgb> to ensure the forest above remains healthy.
